## Description {#details}

Helper class for constructing bundles of MachineInstrs.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mibundlebuilder">MIBundleBuilder</a> can create a bundle from scratch by inserting new MachineInstrs one at a time, or it can create a bundle from a sequence of existing MachineInstrs in a basic block.

Definition at line 591 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbuilder-h">MachineInstrBuilder.h</a>.

### append() {#a6c15d55cada45b3ba4ec4ba5560c39c4}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Insert MI into MBB by appending it to the instructions in the bundle.

MI will become the last instruction in the bundle.
